__e: So what you're saying, sir, is there must have been two of them?
I guessed as much that the glasses must belong to you. The funny part is, it's really yours.
- You make me think the worst of your husband and your father.
They weren't very good, were they? I'm so embarrassed.
This isn't who my children were supposed to be.
They should not be in for another week!
All because they talked when they shouldn't have.
It's not what your parents had in mind when they pushed you to go to law school.
The way she put it, for talking when they shouldn't have.
You may believe that they did what they had to do, that they were afraid and so they--
And the teacher saw it, and they did everything that they were supposed to.
- Well no, they did exactly what they had to do with it.
This isn't the way things were meant to be.
And I don't believe that that's the way things were supposed to be.
This wasn't the way things were supposed to be--
They were supposed to pick us up.
He said they're coming next week.
These other people were supposed to come, at the last minute they decided not to--and that's it, that's what happened!
How old should these children be?
You know, I don't know the specifics, but they must have really been underwater, because they practically gave me the house.
This is the only time I saw the two of them together, but... clearly, they were involved.
